name: css-white-space
description: Css module of single purpose classes for white space

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-white-space.css > css/css-white-space.css && tachyons src/css-white-space.css --minify > css/css-white-space.min.css && tachyons src/css-white-space.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
